Please help me any one. Without pagination I wanted to display all the form submission data for a specific form.
Thanks in advance

And another thing I want to checked the multi checkbox values automatically  based on post values on form load using "onFormReady($form){}" function and i got email with the correct checkbox values in the first time, In second and third time I got additional check box values in email please check the below code I am using correctly?
Please help me

My goal is check the specific option values on form load but option will be dynamically based on the post values

Hi All, our company website in HubSpot <http://www.techedgegroup.com|www.techedgegroup.com> have rate B in the test SSL and we need the rate A, I think the problem is that we must upgrade the TLS because the version 1.0 and 1.1 are deprecated. It's correct? The section for upgrade the TLS version in HubSpot is this? Do you think that we have any problem with out customers on our website? Thanks a lot!

Hello everyone.
Trying to create custom object for our portal using private app access token. But during creation get an error:
```Authentication credentials not found. This API supports both API Key and OAuth 2.0 authentication and you can find more details at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/auth/oauth-overview>'```
But if i try to get list of custom objects using same token I successfully get response. What is the problem?
Do you have the custom.schema.create option toggle on for that private app
<@U01QVR44MEY> I have toggled on crm.objects.custom.read, crm.objects.custom.write, crm.schemas.custom.read, crm.schemas.custom.write

Hey <@U01QVR44MEY> It seems that you guys may have some problem with scaling requests. It may be something with amazon auto scaling or waking up the servers <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Problem-with-Activity-Login-endpoint/m-p/711088#M58192>
Hi guys. I have a questions, hope anyone can solve please. is: Can I, call throw API data from pannels?
Can you explain this a little more?
Hi everyone
Has anyone used API to get non email campaign (campaigns that are not email campaigns ) information from HS

Hi Everyone,
We use the legacy submission method <https://api.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/integration/submit/:portalId/:formGuid> in our website
Can someone tell me if I am affected by the API Key Sunset?
Let me double check but yes I'm 90% sure you'll be affected
Thanks Carster
fyi, we don't use API Key when we do a POST

Yep so you can continue using that api and you will not be affect by the api key sunset but if you were to upgrade to this api <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As%20this%20API%20is%20authenticated%2C> you will be affected
I would suggest upgrading to the above api for better rate limits and not requiring the listing of the submitted form fields in the definition beforehand.
"not requiring the listing of the submitted form fields in the definition beforehand" can you please elaborate more?
So you don't need to define the properties for the object before hand, you can just send it
awesome thanks for that
Of course

so if I were to use <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form_v3_authentication#:~:text=As%20this%20API%20is%20authenticated%2C> then I may need to upgrade my authentication to Private apps right?
correct
Get an AccessToken from the private app, and that as a bearer token in the header
yep, the private access token will start with `pat-`
cool
Thanks Carter
just to confirm, I can still use the following endpoint?
<https://api.hsforms.com/submissions/v3/integration/secure/submit/:portalId/:formGuid>
of course, let me know if you have any more questions down the line
use the access token instead of the APIKey

You have made it easy for me,  not sure what timezone you fall in, but hoping that you have a great day
